trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Canandaigua
There were no other sightings in Canandaigua on or around October 15th 1970
divs: sighting detailswhile traveling eb on a rural road in upstate ny in the fall of 1970 i observed something coming at me ( wb) just above the power lines ( about 60 ft) my wife and my 2 1\2 y\o son were with me. as i slowed down and pulled of to the shoulder, the ufo was in front of me but going only about 15 mph in the opposite direction (wb) i stepped out of the car and observed a rust colored, flying wing shape ( or boomerang) craft just above the power lines ( about 50 ft ) it had lights but i do not recall what color or how many. my wife was now yelling at me to get back in the car. i did not. i watched as it passed over emitting no sound. as i turned to look at it going wb, it disappeard in about 1 second emitting no sound whatsoever and was gone in " blink of an eye' . i should have reported in in 1970 but back then it would have been ridiculed. i am much wiser now and truly believe in ufo's. there is just too much evidence to just look the other way. thank you for your time. rr butler
Summary: appeared slightly over the power lines. rust colored,boomerang shaped,ribs apparent,disappeared w/b with no sound. about 40 ft wingspan.
